last_episode_to_air.name: Innocent, OK?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Robby's gambler's luck run out at last?

name: Big Deal
overview: The ups and downs of small time London gambler Robby Box, and the effect that his poker addiction has on his long suffering girlfriend Jan Oliver and family.

episodes.name: Red Lady, Black Night
episodes.overview: Robby Box makes his living playing poker. Some people say he's got it made, but his girlfriend Jan isn't one of them.

episodes.name: One Good Turnover
episodes.overview: Professional poker players like Robby Box meet all sorts of opponents. When they lose, some get very upset....

episodes.name: A Ragged Run
episodes.overview: Robby susses out a crooked gambling house for a friend, but only brings trouble on himself....

episodes.name: Some You Win...
episodes.overview: An evening race meeting, a horse that can't lose! Robby Box must get to the course and place his bet. But Jan has other plans.

episodes.name: The Luck of the Irish
episodes.overview: One of Robby Box 's cronies goes to the big betting shop in the sky. Now it's up to Robby to make sure he gets a good send-off.

episodes.name: Fighting Chance
episodes.overview: Robby Box is invited to play poker with the nobs, but first he must find the 'sit-down' money. There's a 'fixed' fight he can bet on - but which way has it been 'fixed'?

episodes.name: Video Man
episodes.overview: Henry Diamond take the day off. But is Robby's new business all it appears to be?

episodes.name: Cash Flow
episodes.overview: Robby Box makes a couple of discoveries: old friends aren't always the best friends, and love can be very expensive.

episodes.name: Nine Bob Notes
episodes.overview: Robby Box and his mate, Geordie, scare an intruder out of Henry Diamond's yard. They think they are doing Diamond a favour.

episodes.name: Home and Dry
episodes.overview: Robby Box has saved up nearly all the money he needs to get straight with the tax man. But now he hears that an American, Mr Poker himself, has just flown in.

episodes.name: Down and Under
episodes.overview: Robby Box is down and out in London. His girlfriend Jan is down under. Will they never meet?

episodes.name: Getting Knotted
episodes.overview: After hitting rock-bottom, there's only one way for Robby Box to go. But first he must come to terms with Jan. And then find his mother's missing bridegroom.

episodes.name: What Are Friends For?
episodes.overview: Mum's marriage on the rocks already? And a well-heeled rival for Jan's affections ... everything seems to be falling apart again for Robby Box.

episodes.name: Popping Across the Pond
episodes.overview: Desperate to stop Jan from going back to Australia, Robby Box has a brainwave. Or is it his worst idea yet?

episodes.name: Breakthrough
episodes.overview: Robby Box is flying high, establishing himself as a sober citizen. But Jan is getting into deep water with Grover and his friends.

episodes.name: Guv'nor
episodes.overview: With half of the Dragon Club in his pocket Robby Box gets the chance to win it all.

episodes.name: Partners
episodes.overview: Robby Box , the new owner of the 'Dragon Club', seems to be getting his head above water at last. Then an old enemy turns up.

episodes.name: The Rabbit and the Mare
episodes.overview: Ferret's dog, Mrs MacGregor, goes missing again and Robby Box sees a long-odds chance of making a killing.

episodes.name: Windfall
episodes.overview: Robby Box can no longer duck and dive away from the taxman. But when Debby's life is threatened, tax is the least of his problems.

episodes.name: I Gotta Horse
episodes.overview: Robby Box has a new female friend, Sadie Toscana. Can Sadie bring him and Jan together again?

episodes.name: The Big Sleep
episodes.overview: Promises to Jan, debts to the Inland Revenue, Robby is at it again, keeping too many balls in the air. His only assets are his wits and his club.

episodes.name: The Z Team
episodes.overview: At the bottom of the heap again, Robby Box will do anything for money. He'll even teach his friends to play poker!

episodes.name: Deals on Wheels
episodes.overview: Robby Box sorts out a fiddle at Gil's Betting Shop and helps a friend in need.

episodes.name: Tuppence Coloured
episodes.overview: When Robby Box wins a card game in the hospital, he ends up 'painting the town'.

episodes.name: The Chicken and the Egg
episodes.overview: Robby Box will bet on anything, but it's a different matter when it comes to gambling with his own life.

episodes.name: Panel Money
episodes.overview: Lumbered with a cuckoo in the nest, Robby Box sets out to put things right, but gets them wrong.... and right.

episodes.name: Following in Father's Footsteps
episodes.overview: Robby Box has something he would like to say to Jan, but Ronnie Day and a load of forged bank-notes get in his way ...

episodes.name: Playing the Ace
episodes.overview: Robby Box goes a long way out of his way to help a lady and himself.

episodes.name: The Biggest Deal
episodes.overview: Robby Box is perfectly serious about giving up gambling... until he hears a certain American is in town.

episodes.name: Innocent, OK?
episodes.overview: Robby's gambler's luck run out at last?
